p: Positive samples by cELISA were also analyzed for presence of RVFV neutralising antibody by the PRNT 80 assay and 89% (93/104) of all cELISA-positive samples were PRNT-positive. All (47/47) cELISA positive samples from the Kyela district contained RVFV neutralising antibody, while 81% (46/57) of the samples from Morogoro district had neutralising antibody. Antibody titres ranged from 1:10 to 1:10240 and above ( S1 Table). Some ELISA positive cattle samples collected from wards in Morogoro district gave titers below 1:10 which was considered negative.
